channel.title: python on Sneha Shah
channel.description: Recent content in python on Sneha Shah

item.title: Sudoku Solver
item.description: GUI sudoku solver that combines manual and backtracking approaches for quicker solving. Uses python and tkinter. Working on using image processing to identify numbers on a book using a camera.

item.title: Cut The Rope
item.description: Game created in high school for 12th grade Computer Science project. Uses pygame for graphics and pictures from the original cut the rope to create our own game with 3 levels. Level 1 Screenshot from game
Popular android game 2048 that can be played on your terminal. Requires python2.6
